Posts.EditableText: Is there any way I could move the player character to a room, without having them have to move in a direction? I want the player to fall into a trap and end up in a different room.
Posts.HTML:
Is there any way I could move the player character to a room, without having them have to move in a direction?
I want the player to fall into a trap and end up in a different room.

Posts.EditableText:
You can do this by script. 
Choose in the gui
Move [object] [player] to [object] [[i:3hsxczgf]destinationroom[/i:3hsxczgf]]
Posts.HTML:
You can do this by script.
Choose in the gui
Move [object] [player] to [object] [destinationroom

Posts.EditableText: THANKS! This helps a lot, now I can start working on my game again.
Posts.HTML: THANKS! This helps a lot, now I can start working on my game again.
